data.message: I will opt  for you  to stop playing   with  the proper coke   don't  like   the new taste   you  did it  befor   and then  you put it  back  to proper  stuff    so  do that  now  ...NO ONE  LIKES  THE NEW TASTE...

replies.message: Hi Kay, thanks for getting in touch. There hasn't been a formula change to Coca-Cola Classic in Great Britain. Hope this helps

Why does Coca~Cola taste better in the Middle East e.g. Israel, than it does in the U.K.?! If you buy the cokes from certain self run shops sometimes you can find a coke that taste like the middle eastern ones, but not in Main Street shops. It taste so much better in Israel. I've drink so much coke these past two months and I still haven't won a holiday 😭😂

Hi Mila, thanks for getting in touch. Coca-Cola is made from the same formula in the 200 different countries and is designed to taste the same throughout the world. However it's possible for it to vary slightly in taste due to such factors as temperature, foods with which it is served, storage conditions or even ice cubes. Hope this helps.
i bought a coke the other day it was disgusting
Hi Lisa, could you please give us a call on 0800 22 77 11 (option 2), so we can look into this for you. Thanks
